data.name: Shades Of Rayna - Warrior Class
data.detailed_description:
Warrior class for Shades Of Rayna.

Warrior is the first melee character of the game and uses two handed axe and just like Ranger, has 10 active and 5 passive skills.

Actives:
Throw - Throw a rotating axe on mouse location
Slice - Quickly swing your axe to deal damage to close enemies
Ground Slam - Leap and hit the ground dealing area damage
Thunder Strike - Hit your axe to ground and call a thunder
Burning Ball - Swing your axe and throw a burning ball that explodes on hit
Toxic Hit - Hit your axe to ground and create a poisonous area
Whirlwind - Swing yourself with your axe and deal damage over time
Glacial - Hit your axe to ground and make a glacial road that deals damage and slow enemies
Rage - Enter the rage mode that boosts your damage, attack speed and defence
Earthbreaker - Leap into the air and when you hit the ground, shape the earth with 3 seperate ways that deals damage

Passives:
Harden - You don't get hit by the upcoming attack with 25% chance
Steal - Your basic attacks steal 1.5% of your max health amount of life to your health
Second Chance - When your health reach 0, you resurrect with %50 health (Triggers once in a map)
Scatter - At every hit, your axe spreads small fragments that deals 25% of your base damage
Counter - Counter the upcoming attack and create an explosion dealing your base damage with 25% chance

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
